sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-container>
        <v-row class="d-flex justify-content-between mt-5">
            <v-col>
                <v-form @submit.prevent="searchProducts">
                    <v-row>
                        <v-col cols="auto">
                            <v-select
                             v-model="searchType"
                             :items="searchOptions"
                             item-title="text"
                             item-value="value"
                            >

                            </v-select>
                        </v-col>

                        <v-col>
                            <v-text-field
                            v-model="searchValue" label="Search"
                            >
                                
                            </v-text-field>
                        </v-col>

                        <v-col cols="auto">
                            <v-btn type="submit">검색</v-btn>    
                        </v-col>

                    </v-row>
                </v-form>
            </v-col>

            <v-col cols="auto" v-if="!isAdmin">
                <v-btn color="secondary" class="mr-2">장바구니</v-btn>
                <v-btn color="success">주문하기</v-btn>
            </v-col>

            <v-col cols="auto" v-if="isAdmin">
                <v-btn href="/product/create" color="success">상품등록</v-btn>
            </v-col>
        </v-row>
        <v-row>
            <v-col></v-col>
        </v-row>
    </v-container>
</template>

<script>
export default{
    props: ['isAdmin'],
    data(){
        return{
            searchType: 'optional',
            searchOptions: [
                {text:"선택", value:'optional'},
                {text:"상품명", value: "name"},
                {text:"카테고리", value: "category"}
            ],
            searchValue: ""
        }
    },
    methods:{
        searchProducts(){

        }
    }
}
</script>
